metadata.name: Legendary Lions
metadata.description:
The Legendary Looks Barbershop in Vernon, CT is entering a new era with the launch of the Legendary Lions! Holding this token entitles you to premium services with every haircut such as ear and eyebrow care, discounts on merchandise, and a hot towel shave with every cut.

[Book your Appointment Today](https://www.fresha.com/a/legendary-looks-barbershop-vernon-30-lafayette-square-mdmwqxsc/booking?menu=true)
